alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 18 at 10:12AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Lost River Valley and Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin zones. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.3 Thu 9 am MDT 3.5 3.8 4.1 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ068-074-192015- /O.CON.KPIH.FL.A.0002.230520T1909Z-000000T0000Z/ /HWRI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1012 AM MDT Thu May 18 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys
